description:
Thank you everyone for this amazing opportunity! To all the livers, my friends, and everyone who has supported me to this point. This has truly been a dream come true.
I can never thank you all enough!!!!

✨SPECIAL THANKS✨
@AmamiyaKokoro for voicing the intro
@petragurin for helping with editing the intro
@SonnyBrisko and @ShuYamino for their "nyas" in No.1
@MioriCelesta for mixing
Yugo for providing instrumentals
NIJI Staff and everyone involved!
The Bros for being awesome

✨GUESTS✨
@Pikamee 
@TakanashiKiara 

@MillieParfait
@LucaKaneshiro 
@SelenTatsuki
@NinaKosaka 

@FinanaRyugu
@EliraPendora 

✨---------✨

『ダーリンダンス // Darling Dance』
Original: かいりきベア
Instrumental: Yugo Asuma
Choreography: @AsibutoPenta 

『No.1』
Original: Honeyworks
Instrumental: Yugo Asuma
Choreography: @miko02xx 

『Fairy of AKIBerse』
Singer: Pomu Rainpuff
Composer: MOSAIC.WAV
Lyrics: MOSAIC.WAV

✨---------✨
【Streamlabs Donations】
https://streamlabs.com/pomurainpuff/tip

Follow me here!
【Twitter】 https://twitter.com/PomuRainpuff

【Voice Packs】
https://nijisanji-store.com/collections/pomu-rainpuff

【Fan Letters】
https://www.nijisanji.jp/en/contact

TAGS
PKZ = Ikuzo but with Pomu!!
Stream: #PomuLive
Art: #PomuPaint
Meme: #bigppmemes
Fan name: Pomudachi
Oshi mark: 🧚🍂

✨---------✨
RULES

THANKS FOR WATCHING!!
1. Please be respectful to everyone!
2. No spamming, trolling, or discussing controversial subjects
3. Please don't bring up other streamers unless I mention them first and please don't mention me in other streamer's chats
4. Please keep comments relevant to the stream
5. No spoilers!
6. Believing in fairies is a must!!!

✨---------✨
【Follow Lazulight!】
Elira: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIeSUTOTkF9Hs7q3SGcO-Ow
Finana: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCu-J8uIXuLZh16gG-cT1naw
Lazulight Original Song - Diamond City Lights (Official MV): https://youtu.be/ZnP0cKNPE04
